column5: IT'S THE MEET AND GREET 2007------WE ARE ALL FISHIN LIKE WE WERE IN HEAVEN.  JACKSONS POINT IS THE PLACE TO BE------AND MARCH THE 3RD IT WILL BE YOU AND ME. JUST FOLLOW US OUT AND TO CATCH SOME FISH---OH YEA..WE SHOULD ALL BRING A SMALL LITTLE WISH. IF YOUR LOOKIN FOR A GOOD OLD MEAL---IT'S TIME TO CHECK YOUR VERY OWN REEL. IT'S NICE TO SEE EVERYONE AGAIN AND---NOT TO JUDGE EVERYONE AS IF THEY WERE KIN.  CHEERS  SIMCOEBOB
